title: Hospital Network System Design Using Cisco Packet Tracer
details: Technologies implemented; Hierarchical Network Design, ISPs, VLANs, Inter-VLAN Routing (Switch Virtual Interface SVI), DHCP Server, Port-Security, SSH, NAT Overload(Port Address Translation PAT), ACL, Site-to-Site IPsec VPN, WLAN (how to configure access points), Static IPv4 Addressing, Host Configurations e.t.c
